articles.title: Missing TB cases 'key to elimination' - Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance
articles.description: "With investment in new technologies to diagnose missing cases, TB can be eliminated, say disease experts."
articles.content:
In the journey towards a world free of Tuberculosis (TB), the crucial first step begins with identifying individuals affected by the disease.
Globally, around 1.3 million people died from TB in 2022… [+5804 chars]

articles.title: NASA says three asteroids will pass Earth by a close margin today; Check speed, size and more - HT Tech
articles.description: As many as three asteroids are expected to fly past Earth by a close margin today, March 28. From size and speed to distance of approach, know all about these close encounters, as per NASA.
articles.content: Just yesterday, 3 asteroids passed Earth by a close margin. While none of them were considered Potentially Hazardous Asteroids, the biggest of them was 150 feet wide, making it almost as big as an ai… [+2809 chars]

articles.title: Apple Is On Google And OpenAI’s Disposal For An AI-Powered Chatbot In iOS 18, As Company’s Own Version Remains Unlikely - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple is slated to rely on Google, OpenAI, and Baidu for an AI-powered chatbot as its own version remains unlikely for iOS 18 on iPhone.
articles.content: Apple announced yesterday that it will be hosting its highly anticipated WWDC 2024 event on June 10 to announce iOS 18 and a bunch of other updates for its entire product line. We have previously cov… [+2273 chars]
